questions.question: How is the chi-square statistics calculated?

answers.a: by comparing the means of two samples
answers.c: by calculating the standard deviation of the data
answers.d: by comparing the observed and expected frequencies

questions.question: In a 4×3 contingency table used for testing the independence of attributes A and B, the distribution of test statistic under null hypothesis is:
What is the degree of freedom in a chi-square test?

answers.a: the number of observations in the data
answers.b: the number of categories in the data
answers.c: the number of independent observations in the data
answers.d: the number of variables in the data

questions.question: For testing whether the theoretical probability distribution is suitable for the sample data, which of the following test is to be conducted?

answers.b: chi-square test for goodness of fit
